title: The Great Wobo Escape Ep. 1 apk + data
description:
Alone and unarmed, your only chance is to hide in shadows, use the environment to your favor while crushing dieselpunk enemy robots. Stealth approach may quickly shift into fast-paced escape combined with creating diversion, causing chaos and avoiding tricky hazards.

KEY FEATURES
â€¢ Fast-paced action-filled stealth adventure in a game full of puzzles, deadly enemies, hidden passages or dangerous traps
â€¢ Unique visual style - play as a futuristic high-tech robot, fight steampunk/dieselpunk mechanical enemies of various sizes and shapes
â€¢ Beautiful 3D graphics - pushing limits of mobile devices with detailed, high-res textures, environments and characters, visually rich effects, motion-captured animations and moves of characters.
â€¢ Support for most controllers
â€¢ Play on Android TV!

* * * This game features advanced graphics. To optimize performance, you may want to close down other running applications before playing the game. Minimum hardware configuration is 1 GB of RAM. * * * 

All levels from 1 to 8 are unlocked as part of ep1.

What's New: (November 30th 2015)
- new game mode - HARDCORE mode
- audio setting adjustable directly from ingame menu
- leaderboards accessible from ingame menu
- L07 + L08 camera and dialog fixes
- fixed L02 where barrels could sometimes block path
- updated story video
- ingame menu gamepad fix
- some savepoints can be used multiple times in NORMAL mode

Install APK,Place data folder in SDCard/Android/Obb/ and play.
Requires: Android 4.1 and up
